column1: #text=I wanted to plant an apple tree in my yard .
#text=I thought that my children would enjoy the apples for many years to come .
#text=After picking the perfect tree and bringing it home , I backed my car into the area that I wanted to plant the tree in .
#text=I unloaded the tree and waled to my garage and got a shovel and pulled the garden hose over to the tree .
#text=I dug a very large hole and filled it with water .
#text=I unwrapped the burlap from around the root ball of the tree and placed the tree into the hole .
#text=I filled the hole back in with dirt and patted the soil down firmly .
#text=I watered the soil around the base of the tree .
#text=I will now wait to enjoy fresh crisp apples from my apple tree , hoping that my hard work is worth it .
